unmatched_response:
I support the following commands:
add [name] - Adds a bot with the given name to this team. The name can only contain alphanumeric characters (a-z, A-Z and 0-9).
remove [name] - Removes a bot with the given name from this team.
enable [name] - Enables a bot.
disable [name] - Disables a bot.
rename [name] to [new name] - Renames a bot.
copy [name] - Provides a copy key to paste a bot into another team.
paste [copy key] - Pastes the copied bot into this team.
status - Shows the status of your bots.
tell [name] [command] - Tells a bot to execute a command.
cannot_extract_bot_name: I couldn't determine the name of your bot from your message.
cannot_extract_team_id: I couldn't determine the team id that you are currently in.
bot_not_found_error: You don't have a bot named %s
bot_register_already_exists_error: You already have a bot named %s!
bot_rename_already_exists_error: A bot named '%s' already exists in one of the teams that %s is a part of.
bot_copied: %s has been copied. The copy key is %s.
bot_paste_already_exists_error: There is already a bot with this name in this team
bot_not_found_by_copy_key_error: There is no bot copied under key '%s'
